name: Sonic the Hedegehog 5 | The Next Level
name_original: Sonic the Hedegehog 5 | The Next Level
description: Join Sonic on his next adventure! Explore new worlds that the blue blur hasn't seen before! Sonic even encounters new enemies! Run along with Sonic as he figures out puzzling challenges to get through multiple stages! looks like Sonic has stepped up to the next level.
